text: Joseph Brian Junkin (September 8, 1946 – January 11, 2014) was a Canadian professional ice hockey goaltender who played in one National Hockey League game for the Boston Bruins during the 1968–69 NHL season. He died of cancer on January 11, 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:Hershey Bears players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:World Hockey Association players Category:Central Professional Hockey League players
title: Joe Junkin
